title: Create alternative design version with different aesthetic

requirements.text: Create an alternative design version (Version 3) with a completely different visual aesthetic from the current 2026 gradients/glassmorphism style while maintaining all existing payroll content (employee management, payroll processing, tax filing and compliance, direct deposit, time tracking integration, benefits administration, reporting capabilities, mobile access, and security features)
acceptanceCriteria: All existing content sections from Version 2 are preserved with identical messaging and information
Visual design uses a distinctly different aesthetic approach from the current purple-blue gradients and glassmorphism
All sections present in Version 2 (Hero, FeaturesOverview, MobileAccessSection, ComplianceSection, Footer) are included with new styling
Design maintains professional credibility appropriate for a financial/payroll service platform
New design system is applied consistently across all components and sections

requirements.text: Design the alternative version with a cohesive, modern visual theme that differentiates it from the current gradient-heavy, glassmorphic aesthetic - explore options such as minimalist with bold typography, corporate clean with strong geometry, warm and approachable with softer colors, or dark mode with high contrast accents
acceptanceCriteria: New design direction is visually distinct from Version 2's purple-blue gradients and glassmorphism
Color palette, typography, layout patterns, and component styling create a unified visual identity
Design choice is appropriate for a professional payroll management platform
Visual hierarchy effectively guides users through content while maintaining brand trustworthiness

constraints: Preserve all existing payroll content and messaging from Version 2
Maintain professional credibility appropriate for financial services
Do not modify Internet Identity hooks or authentication components
nonGoals: Adding new features or functionality beyond design changes
Modifying content or copy from the current version
Creating multiple design variations (only one alternative design)
